item.title: Behind the Mask of Zorro
item.description: Behind the Mask of Zorro or E Zorro cabalga otra vez is a 1965 Italian western film directed by Ricardo Blasco.

item.title: Adiós gringo
item.description: Adiós gringo is a 1965 Italian Spaghetti Western directed by Giorgio Stegani. Its stars Giuliano Gemma and was co produced between Italy, Spain and France. On release in the United States, nearly all of the cast members and production team had their names changed for the English audience. A major success, it was the 4th highest grossing picture of the year in Italy.

item.title: Per un pugno nell'occhio
item.description: Per un pugno nell'occhio is a 1965 Italian film. It is a spaghetti western parody of Fistful of Dollars and was also known as Fistful of Knuckles and For a Fist in the Eye.

item.title: Ringo the Lone Rider
item.description: Ringo the Lone Rider is a 1968 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti western film directed by Rafael Romero Marchent.

item.title: Ocaso de un pistolero
item.description: Hands of a Gunfighter is a 1965 Spanish-Italian western film directed by Rafael Romero Marchent.

item.title: Apache Fury
item.description: Apache Fury is a 1964 Italian-Spanish Spaghetti Western directed and co-written by José María Elorrieta. It was based on a novel by Eduardo Guzman.
